researchWorkspace.name: Research Workspace

empty.title: No research workspaces
empty.description: To create a research workspace, click Create Research Workspace.

no_match.title: No research workspaces matching the selected filter.
no_match.description: Select "All" to view all the workspaces

researchWorkspace.beingProvisioned: The research workspace is being provisioned

noWorkspaceTypes.title: No workspace types
noWorkspaceTypes.description: There are no workspace types to choose from. Your role might be restricted. Please contact your administrator.

missingAssociation.title: Missing association with projects
missingAssociation.description: You currently do not have permissions to use any projects for the workspace. Please contact your administrator.

noWorkspaceConfs.title: No workspace configurations
noWorkspaceConfs.description: There are no workspace configurations to choose from. Your role might be restricted. Please contact your administrator.

areYouSure.title: Are you sure?
areYouSure.description: This action can not be reverted.

detailPage.noStudies: No studies linked to this workspace

cost.error1: An error occurred while retrieving the cost information.
cost.error2: If this workspace is provisioned in a new account, verify with your administer that the cost explorer feature is enabled for the account.
cost.error3: The system returned this error message:

COMPLETED.tip: The workspace is ready to be used.

PENDING.tip: The workspace is being prepared, this could take sometime.

TAINTED.tip: The workspace is ready but the latest configuration updates might not have been successful.

TERMINATING.tip: The workspace is being terminated. This could take sometime.

TERMINATED.tip: The workspace is terminated successfully and no longer available.

TERMINATING_FAILED.tip: The workspace was not terminated correctly, it is possible that some compute and storage resources are still in place.

UNKNOWN.tip: Something not right. This requires further investigation by the administrator.
